name: Spa One Bedroom Suite
description: One-bedroom suite in the Spa Tower featuring a separate bedroom and living area with spa-inspired luxury appointments. Enjoy premium amenities including plush robes, designer toiletries, and access to the resort's spa facilities for the ultimate Reno getaway.
shortDescription: Spacious one-bedroom suite in the Spa Tower with separate living area and spa amenities.

meta.title: Spa One Bedroom Suite – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Spa One Bedroom Suite at Eldorado Reno – spacious suite with separate living area in the Spa Tower.

testimonials.quote: Spa One Bedroom Suite was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Scott M.

testimonials.quote: Visited Spa One Bedroom Suite during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: John H.
